name: Aegis
description: Block the next incoming attack; stacks duration.

name: Alacrity
description: Skills recharge faster.

name: Fury
description: Critical chance increased; stacks duration.

name: Might
description: Increased outgoing damage; stacks intensity.

name: Protection
description: Incoming strike damage decreased by 33%; stacks duration.

name: Quickness
description: Skills and actions are faster.

name: Regeneration
description: Gain health every second; stacks duration.

name: Resistance
description: Nondamaging conditions currently on you are ineffective; stacks duration.

name: Resolution
description: Incoming condition damage decreased by 33%; stacks duration.

name: Stability
description: Cannot be knocked down, pushed back, pulled, launched, stunned, dazed, floated, sunk, feared, or taunted.

name: Swiftness
description: Movement speed increased by 33%; stacks duration.

name: Vigor
description: Endurance regeneration increased by 50%; stacks duration.

name: Bleeding
description: Deals damage every second; stacks intensity.

name: Burning
description: Deals damage every second; stacks intensity.

name: Confusion
description: Damage received on skill activation; stacks intensity.

name: Poisoned
description: Deals damage every second; decreases healing effectiveness by 33%; damage stacks intensity.

name: Torment
description: Deals damage every second. Deals additional damage to foes that aren't moving. Stacks intensity.

name: Blinded
description: Next outgoing attack misses; stacks duration.

name: Chilled
description: Movement speed decreased by 66%; skill cooldown increased by 66%; stacks duration.

name: Crippled
description: Movement speed decreased by 50%; stacks duration.

name: Fear
description: Involuntary retreat; unable to act; stacks duration.

name: Immobile
description: Unable to move; stacks duration.

name: Slow
description: Skills and actions are slower.

name: Taunt
description: Involuntarily attack foes.

name: Weakness
description: Endurance regeneration decreased by 50%. 50% of hits are Glancing Blows (50% damage). Stacks duration.

name: Vulnerability
description: Damage and condition damage taken are increased; stacks intensity.

name: Superspeed
description: Movement speed is greatly increased. Maximum duration: 10s

name: Revealed
description: You cannot stealth

name: Stealth
description: Currently invisible. Ends if you deal damage.

name: Unblockable
description: Your attacks are unblockable

name: Chaos Aura
description: Give yourself random boons and your foe random conditions whenever you are struck.

name: Dark Aura
description: Surrounded by a dark aura that reduces incoming condition damage and causes torment each time you are struck (1-second cooldown per attacker).

name: Fire Aura
description: Enveloped in a fiery shield that burns foes, grants might each time you are struck (1-second cooldown per attacker).

name: Frost Aura
description: Chill foes that strike you (only once per second for each attacker); incoming damage is reduced by 10%.

name: Light Aura
description: When struck, you gain resolution. Incoming condition damage is reduced by 10%. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 1 Second )</c>

name: Magnetic Aura
description: Reflect projectiles with magnetic energy.

name: Shocking Aura
description: Stun nearby attacking foes with an electric shock (only once per 2 seconds for each attacker).

name: Agony
description: Deals damage every second; stacks intensity; reduces incoming healing and barrier application by 70% per stack; damage is reduced by agony resistance.

name: Inspiring Virtue

name: Invigorated Bulwark

name: Symbolic Avenger
description: Deal increased damage per stack.

description: Regenerate health.

name: Taste for Blood
description: Siphon health from enemies on hit.

name: Vampiric Aura
description: Siphon health when you hit.

name: Last Rites
description: You do not lose health while downed.

name: Soul Shards
description: Striking an enemy with Perforate siphons health from them.

name: Extirpation
description: Incoming boons are negated. Remove one stack when an incoming boon is negated.

name: Vampiric Mark
description: Life is siphoned when struck by players.

name: Plague Signet
description: Reduce incoming condition damage.

name: Signet of the Locust
description: Movement speed increased by 25%.

name: Signet of Spite
description: Improved power.

name: Spectral Walk
description: Consume conditions to gain life force.

name: Spectral Walk (tether)
description: Walking in the shadows, leaving behind a spectral trail.

name: Lich Form
description: Assumed the form of a powerful lich.

name: Grim Specter
description: Gaining vitality.

name: Implacable Foe
description: Take reduced incoming damage.

name: Blight
description: Reduces your maximum health. Stacks intensity.

name: Lingering Spirits (Anguish)
description: You deal increased strike damage.

name: Lingering Spirits (Wanderlust)
description: Your movement speed is increased.

name: Lingering Spirits (Preservation)
description: Your outgoing healing is increased.

name: Nightmare Weapon
description: Striking a foe will steal life and inflict vulnerability.

name: Weapon of Warding
description: Block attacks. Gain protection when the last stack is removed.

name: Splinter Weapon
description: Striking a foe will cause additional strikes on nearby foes.

name: Xinrae's Weapon
description: When you take damage over a percentage of your maximum health, heal for the difference, then steal life from that foe.
